resources.string: Utzi gaztelua b4 laukian (Crazyhouse aldaeran bakarrik)

string.name: readOutClocks
string.comment:
readOutClocks
This is the help text for one of the possible keyboard commands. When this command is entered, the current clocks (player's remaining time) is read out loud. 'Read out' is used as a verb here.

resources.string: Goiko mugimenduen notazioa ez bada ezaguna, gehiago ikasi hemen:
Bai \"o\" hizkia, bai zero \"0\" digitua erabil daitezke endrokatzean

string.name: ifItIsLegalToCastleBothWays
string.comment:
ifItIsLegalToCastleBothWays
'Enter' as in the key on a standard keyboard.

resources.string: Bi aldeetako endrokea egitea legezkoa bada erabili enter endroke laburra egiteko

string.name: capitalizationOnlyMattersInAmbiguousSituations
string.comment:
capitalizationOnlyMattersInAmbiguousSituations
Note: Piece letters (K, Q, R, B, N) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Letra larriak alfila eta b-ko peoia bereizte erabiltzen dira (piezen izenak ingelesez daude Alfila = Bishop ingelesez)
Aurre-mugimendua egiteko, idatzi nahi duzun mugimendua zure txanda izan aurretik
